trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""></xref>事件<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property gets a new instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>属性获取的新实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>枚举时<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>引发事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the current state of the audio input using the `AudioState` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取音频输入使用的当前状态`AudioState`属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>类。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new state of audio input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 获取识别器的音频输入的新状态。

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property contains one of three values from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: AudioState 属性包含从三个值之一<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>枚举。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of audio input after a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 音频输入后的状态<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"></xref>引发事件。
